mapper.insert: insert into joinedMember_tb (joinedmember_key, joinedmember_docId, joinedmember_flag, joinedmember_memberId) values (#{key}, #{docId}, #{flag}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select joinedmember_key key, joinedmember_docId docId, joinedmember_flag flag, joinedmember_memberId memberId from joinedMember_tb where joinedmember_docId=#{docId}
select joinedmember_key key, joinedmember_docId docId, joinedmember_flag flag, joinedmember_memberId memberId from joinedMember_tb where joinedmember_docId=#{docId}
